imprints.imprintline1: This website is a project called "Transcendence" created for educational purposes.
imprints.contactinfo1: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this project, you can contact us via email at
imprints.disclaimer1: This project is solely for coding learning and educational purposes. It is not intended for any commercial use or production deployment.

privacy.privpolline1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Transcendence's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website.
privacy.infocollectline1: We only collect the personal information you provide to us. This may include:
privacy.deletingline1: If you wish to delete your profile, please click on the "Delete Profile" button provided. Upon clicking, your profile information will be permanently removed from our system.
privacy.deployinfoline1: Please note that Transcendence is a school project and not intended for production. It is deployed solely for educational purposes.
privacy.contactusline1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email at

game.controls: Left Player: W/S - Right Player: UP/DOWN
